market.title: Apartment House Buyer

If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Plex Buyer
market.description:
Buyer offers $25,000 per unit for all units in any combination of duplexes, 4-plexes, or 8-plexes. Has own financing.
<u>Everyone may sell</u> at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Limited Partnership Sold
market.description:
The business has been sold and you receive <u>twice your original cost</u> for your share of it.
You agreed to sell if and when the founder sold out, as she just did. New owners have their own financing.
<u>Every limited partnership is affected</u>. If you own a limited partnership, receive cash and reduce your cash flows immediately.

market.title: Limited Partnership Sold
market.description:
The business has been sold and you receive <u>twice your original cost</u> for your share of it.
You agreed to sell if and when the founder sold out, as she just did. New owners have their own financing.
<u>Every limited partnership is affected</u>. If you own a limited partnership, receive cash and reduce your cash flows immediately.

market.title: Limited Partnership Sold
market.description:
The business has been sold and you receive <u>three times your original cost</u> for your share of it.
You agreed to sell if and when the founder sold out, as he just did. New owners have their own financing.
<u>Every limited partnership is affected</u>. If you own a limited partnership, receive cash and reduce your cash flows immediately.

market.title: Small Business Improves
market.description:
The small business you founded won an industry award for its product innovation. Great publicity causes your sales to double.
This brings more problems and requires more time from you, but Monthly Net Income goes up $250.
<u>Everyone</u> who owns a business they started is affected and <u>increases</u> their cash flows by $250 per month on all such businesses.

market.title: Small Business Improves
market.description:
The small business you founded has found a major company to distribute its product. Your sales increase 150%.
This brings more problems and requires more time from you, but Monthly Net Income goes up $400.
<u>Everyone</u> who owns a business they started is affected and <u>increases</u> their cash flows by $400 per month on all such businesses.

market.title: Builder Wants Land
market.description:
City planners require builder to put in 10 acre park or they will not approve new subdivision. Builder needs 10 acres with stream.
Cash offer of $150,000 to <u>everyone</u> who owns such a property.
If you sell, give up teh cash flow you currently receive from this property.

market.title: Buyer for 20 Acres
market.description:
Builder wants a 20-acre parcel of land. He will re-zone it from residential to commercial.
Cash offer of $200,000 to <u>everyone</u> who owns 20 acres of residential land.
If you sell, give up the cash flow you currently receive from this property.

market.title: Car Wash Buyer
market.description:
Red hot buyer looking for a car wash bargain. Has $250,000 cash ready to spend. That's his limit.
<u>Everyone</u> who owns a car wash may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Collector Wants Gold Coins
market.description:
Collector looking for authentic 1500's Royal Spanish New World (Havana mint only) "pieces of eight" gold coins.
Cash offer of $5,000 for <u>each</u> coin to everyone.

market.title: Demand for Bed & Breakfast
market.description:
Couple burned out from their corporate jobs are ready for a change. Have lots of cash. Looking for a profitable Bed & Breakfast. They will pay $250,000 today.
<u>Everyone</u> with a Bed & Breakfast that is making money may sell at this price.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Inflation Hits!
market.description:
Inflation goes to 10%. Interest rates climb to 20% on home loans.
All 3Br/2Ba rental houses that you (no other players) own are now in foreclosure. You financed with variable rate mortgages.
You must give your 3Br/2Ba house(s) back to the bank. You lose your cash flow from these properties.

market.title: Interest Rates Drop!
market.description:
Interest rates on home loans drop to 5%.
 If you (no other players) own any 3Br/2Ba rental houses you may sell them for $50,000 more than the original cost.
If you sell, pay off the related liability and give up the cash flow you currently receive on each property.

market.title: Price of Gold Soars
market.description:
Rioting in Middle East. Oil prices threatened. Price of gold skyrockets to $600 per ounce.
<u>Everyone</u> who owns 1 ounce Krugerrands may sell at this price.

market.title: Shopping Mall Wanted
market.description:
Major retailer is moving to your town. Looking for small shopping mall to purchase.
They are willing to pay $100,000 to <u>everyone</u> who owns a small shopping mall.
If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow you currently receive on this property.

market.title: Software Company Buyer
market.description:
Large integrated software company offers $100,000 cash for inventive software program and related company.
<u>Anyone</u> who owns a software company may sell at this price.
If you sell, give up the cash flow you currently receive from this company.

market.title: Widget Company Buyer
market.description:
Engineer/Inventor who owns machinery company offers $50,000 cash for inventive method of making widgets.
<u>Anyone who owns a widget company</u> may sell at this price.
If you sell, give up the cash flow you currently receive from this company.

doodad.title: Buy a Café Latte & Cappuccino for You & a Friend
Birthday!
doodad.description:
Take kids to the amusement park and spend $100
(if you have a child)

doodad.title: Shopping Spree!
doodad.description:
Buy new wristwatch (even though you already have 3)
Pay $150

doodad.title: Go to a Concert!
doodad.description:
Dinner, Tickets, & Coffee
Sets you back $180

doodad.title: Couldn't Resist New Painting By Local Artist
Rumor of Layoff
doodad.description:
Go back to school for added skills.
Pay $220 for tuition & books.

doodad.title: Your Daughter's Wedding
doodad.description:
Costs you $2000
(if you have a child)

doodad.title: Buy Big Screen TV
doodad.description:
Pay $4000
(Credit cards OK. If you buy on credit add $4000 to credit cards liability and add $120 to your monthly expenses.)

doodad.title: New Boat!
doodad.description:
Pay $1,000 down and $17,000 on time.
(Add a $17,000 boat loan as a new liability and add a new boat loan payment of $340 to Expenses.)
